name: TehLightbox
short_description: This plugin is made using jQuery and PHP so you need a server with PHP to run it. It can deal with large images so only certain size of it is shown. And it's super easy to install and use. Just add a link with an attribute rel="lightbox" and you good to go. Don't forget to check out the Installation Guide. This plugin is completely free. If you want you can donate or just spred it around.
summary: This plugin is made using jQuery and PHP so you need a server with PHP
